content: ## Manage tags You can edit existing tags. Instance owners can delete tags. 1. Select **Manage tags**. This is available from **Filters** > **Tags** on the **Workflows** page, or in the **+ Add tag** modal in your workflow. 2. Hover over the tag you want to change. 3. Select **Edit** ![Add node icon](/_images/common-icons/edit.png){.off-glb} to rename it, or **Delete** ![Add node icon](/_images/common-icons/delete.png){.off-glb} to delete it. /// warning | Global tags Tags are global. If you edit or delete a tag, this affects all users of your n8n instance. ///
